scripts.deployCloudRun: gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=twiliotest-admin-key.json && gcloud run deploy lovable-ui --source . --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --service-account calproxy-service-account@twiliotest-8d802.iam.gserviceaccount.com --project twiliotest-8d802 --env-vars-file env.yaml
